entry.title: binary-com/perl-Finance-MIFIR-CONCAT
entry.summary:
NAME

Finance::MIFIR::CONCAT - provides CONCAT code generation out of client data according to MIFIR rules

SYNOPSYS

use Finance::MIFIR::CONCAT /mifir_concat/
print mifir_concat({
    cc          => 'DE',
    date        => '1960-01-01',
    first_name  => 'Jack',
    last_name   => 'Daniels',
});
